name: Zooming Secretary
description:
Zooming Secretary is a homebrew game, where you play as a secretary who has to answer phone calls asking trivia information on the subject of history, geography, literature or astronomy. You answer by going to the appropriate file cabinet, remember the topic and then answer the call. You can only hold one topic in your head at a time, indicated by an icon in the top left hand corner. The caller want answers and they want them quick, a phone call starts blue, then red and finally white, before hanging up. Miss five calls and you're fired, although they immediately rehire meaning you have infinite continues.

Also in the office are your co-workers, they mostly distract you from your work although some of them could be helpful. There's the chief who likes to give you instructions and thing that it will make you hurry, but in fact it only slows things down. A woman in red dress with cookies who hangs around all the day, she's big so you can't pass through her. A tall nerdy girl who likes to talk very much, but can't concentrate. She constantly changes topics and may confuse you, but sometimes she may tell something that you actually need. The geeky guy who loves you but fears to even come close, and always acts so awkward that sometimes he can be an obstacle. Swamper with a huge box walks around aimlessly, knocking you down. A handsome guy who inspires you a lot but he always tries to avoid you. Touch him and you get a "wild card" topic with which you can answer any phonecall.

Each level is one day at the office, there are 7 days and one dream section. Beat the game to earn a vacation at the beach.

shot.caption: Title screen
A simple level opening screen
Day 1, a phone is ringing with a history question.
Day 1, by the time you answer a phone call, the next one is usually already ringing
Day 2, your boss likes to give you helpful tips but he only slows you down
Day 2, phone turns white when the caller is about to hang up! Don't miss that call
Day 3, you can't pass the big lady, but you can finish this level easily without the coffee power-up
Day 3, mariana trench is 11 km deep, before the internet existed people kept that kind of information in file cabinets.
Day 4, touch the girl and your file subject will change, sometimes it's just the file you need though..
Day 4, rhymes ARE easier to remember
Dream, walk from desk to desk to answer that one elusive phone call while the boss changes you
Dream, well done, you get bonus!
Day 5, the geeky guy has a crush on you, he stands in your way but you can push him around
Day 5, more fun facts at the top of the screen, who said video games can't be educational?
Day 6, the delivery guy with a box will knock you over.
Day 6, instead of taking the stairs, you can also just jump down
Day 7, the handsome guy walks around and avoids you
Day 7, catch him and you can answer any phone call
Missed too many calls, game over.
Even the game over screen is somewhat satirical of temp work.
